name: soylent green drink
description: A thin slurry of refined human protein mixed with water.  While quite nutritious, it is not particularly tasty.

name: soylent green powder
description: Raw, refined protein made out of people!  While quite nutritious, it is impossible to enjoy in its pure form, try adding water.

name: soylent green shake
description: A thick and tasty beverage made from pure refined human protein and nutritious fruit.

name: fortified soylent green shake
description: A thick and tasty beverage made from pure refined human protein and nutritious fruit.  It has been supplemented with extra vitamins and minerals

name: protein drink
description: A thin slurry of refined protein mixed with water.  While quite nutritious, it is not particularly tasty.

name: protein powder
description: Raw, refined protein.  While quite nutritious, it is impossible to enjoy in its pure form, try adding water.
//: 1 g of protein powder is 0.959 ml, 1 serving is 28g and 27ml

name: protein shake
description: A thick and tasty beverage made from pure refined protein and nutritious fruit.

name: fortified protein shake
description: A thick and tasty beverage made from pure refined protein and nutritious fruit.  It has been supplemented with extra vitamins and minerals
